Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Johnson and his running mate are the only candidates who believe in free trade.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to back up the assertion that Johnson and his running mate are the only candidates who believe in free trade.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that support for the Trans-Pacific Partnership (TPP) is equivalent to support for free trade, which may be a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations or candidates who also support free trade, but they are not mentioned or considered in the claim.
